The video in question is from May 4: 2019, incident when Kejriwal was slapped during a rally at Moti Nagar, New Delhi. The viral clip does not show the slap but its aftermath.
BJP IT cell head Amit Malviya tweeted th: claiming that a man was lynched at a Kejriwal roadshow.
A user: GatimaanBharat claimed on Twitter that AAP workers "lynched" a man in front of Kejriwal.
Another Twitter user with the handle: bpjIndia shared the viral video along with the same text.
